formattedAddress: 128 Nagle Ave #1437, New York, NY 10040, USA
adrFormatAddress: 128 Nagle Ave #1437, New York, NY 10040, USA

originalText.text: Awful customer service! They don’t honor your “scheduled appointment.” The stylist cancelled my appointment on the same day. They buy their likes/followers on social media. Don’t waste your time. Not everything is what it seems

text.text: Awful customer service! They don’t honor your “scheduled appointment.” The stylist cancelled my appointment on the same day. They buy their likes/followers on social media. Don’t waste your time. Not everything is what it seems

originalText.text: I Love This Salon! Every Single Time I Get My Hair Done There I Leave With A Smile. The Atmosphere Is Great And They Keep Me Returning Loyally. I Usually Do Wigs Which Lluvia Installs But Everyone There Does Great! And The Styles Last For Me! Highly Recommend

text.text: I Love This Salon! Every Single Time I Get My Hair Done There I Leave With A Smile. The Atmosphere Is Great And They Keep Me Returning Loyally. I Usually Do Wigs Which Lluvia Installs But Everyone There Does Great! And The Styles Last For Me! Highly Recommend

originalText.text: I really wanted to love this place.  The staff are really nice, professional and social. However I didn't come to make friends. I came to get my weave done right.  I looked through their IG for inspiration and every weave and wig looked right.  I went, and my braids were loose the weave was sewed 4 tracks together I couldn't slip my fingers through a line in the back because everything was tangled.  I complained and they were so nice to let me come again to fix it. Started from scratch again with the same beautician and again my tracks are tangled thread is loose and its only been 1 day.  Tracks are bumpy ...and coming loose. The braids are tight this time,  but the way the weave was sewed on,  just very messy. Spots with no hair, and braid exposed. Im not a newbie to weaves and just wanted something clean and neat to promote hair growth while it rested.  I'll be taking this out soon, it will not last even a month.  I tried but just can't go back for weave.  Maybe a wig.

originalText.text: I LOVE THIS SALON! The staff is great, always make you feel welcomed. Hair quality is bomb! Prices are very decent. They are very organized. I would recommend them to everyone!!!!

text.text: I LOVE THIS SALON! The staff is great, always make you feel welcomed. Hair quality is bomb! Prices are very decent. They are very organized. I would recommend them to everyone!!!!

originalText.text:
The poorest customer service made an appointment with them
I paid 25$ for deposit to secure my appointment date and to have 2 braids then when I arrived they said they can’t take me cause they already have another customer, plus they even knew I had an appointment. I have to find another real quick
